summary.overview: The Credit Card List transaction provides a comprehensive interface for browsing and managing credit card records. It displays paginated lists of credit cards with filtering capabilities by account ID and card number, and allows users to select cards for detailed viewing or updating based on their access privileges.
business_functions: Initialize Program Context - Set up program variables, transaction ID, and clear error messages
Handle Communication Area - Process incoming data from previous transactions or initialize for first run
Process Fresh Start - Reset program state when coming from menu or starting fresh
Validate Function Keys - Check if pressed key (F3, F7, F8, Enter) is valid for current context
Handle Exit Request - Process F3 key to return to main menu
Receive User Input - Capture data entered on the screen including filters and row selections
Validate Account Filter - Check if account ID filter is numeric and 11 digits when provided
Validate Card Filter - Check if card number filter is numeric and 16 digits when provided
Validate Row Selections - Ensure only one row is selected and selection codes are valid (S or U)
Read Credit Cards Forward - Browse credit card records from current position forward
Read Credit Cards Backward - Browse credit card records from current position backward for page up
Filter Credit Card Records - Apply account and card number filters to exclude non-matching records
Initialize Screen Display - Set up screen headers, dates, times, and page numbers
Populate Screen Array - Fill screen rows with credit card data (account, card number, status)
Handle Page Up Navigation - Process F7 key for previous page navigation with boundary checks
Handle Page Down Navigation - Process F8 key for next page navigation
Transfer to Card Detail View - Navigate to card detail program when 'S' (Select) is chosen
Transfer to Card Update Program - Navigate to card update program when 'U' (Update) is chosen
Handle No Records Found - Display appropriate message when no credit cards match criteria
Handle Pagination Boundaries - Manage first/last page indicators and navigation messages

CC00.program_overview: Credit card listing application that displays paginated credit card records with filtering and selection capabilities

CCLI.program_overview: Credit card listing application that displays paginated credit card records with filtering and selection capabilities

datasource_summary.name: User Security File (USRSEC)
datasource_summary.function: User security file used to authenticate user credentials by reading user ID and password information

datasource_summary.name: Credit Card Data File (CARDDAT)
datasource_summary.function: Credit card data file containing card records with details including card number, embossed name, expiration date, and status. Used for card lookup, detail management, updates, and browsing operations

datasource_summary.name: Card Records Alternate Index (CARDAIX)
datasource_summary.function: Alternate index file for accessing card records by account ID (referenced but not actively used in current logic)

screen_preview.content: Tran:CA00 AWS Mainframe Modernization Date:mm/dd/yy Prog:COADM01C CardDemo Time:hh:mm:ss Admin Menu 1. User List (Security) 2. User Add (Security) 3. User Update (Security) 4. User Delete (Security) 5. Transaction Type List/Update (Db2) 6. Transaction Type Maintenance (Db2) Please select an option : ENTER=Continue F3=Exit
